data.title: CHEESE GRITS Bowl
data.text:
Good morning Warner Vegas, it's time for some WH Breakfast! I noticed someone had a Hashbrown Bowl that looked mighty tastey. Well I looked it over on the menu and yup it's a NEW item and only need $7.00.
I made a few changes to suite my needs and wants and that was changed it to a Cheese Grits  Bowl with chunks of Hamilton vs Crumbled Sausage with two slices of America cheese. NOW talk about some good eating on a Saturday morning...hmmmmm so good!!!

data.title: Outstanding
data.text: I arrived at about 4:50 am and the staff was there, no customers. Everyone was friendly and my food arrived in about five minutes, piping hot and cooked to perfection. I found this restaurant on Trip Advisor. The restaurant was clean and the staff made sure it stays that way. I highly recommend this Waffle House, drop by for a good meal.

data.title: A Waffle House by Any Other Name is a Waffle House
data.text: One of the great things about Waffle Houses, wherever you go, is their consistency.  You will always find your favorite menu items anywhere you find a Waffle House.  Over the years, of course, there have been some minor changes, like no longer having pork chops with eggs on the menu, but by and large, consistency is just that.  Two of us decided on the steak and eggs, one with tomato slices and the other with hash brown potatoes.  The steaks were, naturally, thin and nicely done in the manner we requested.  The tomato slices were as good as you can obtain here in the winter months...good, but not vine ripened.  Our son opted for bacon, which was cooked crisp without burning.  I asked for well done hash browns, and got just that...done exactly as I like them. If you are not familiar with Waffle House, one of their specials is hashbrowns done with a variety of toppings.  Had I not been dieting, that would have been my joy of the day!  Linda, our server was very attentive without being overbearing.  A fun breakfast, all around.

data.title: Waffle House it Is!
data.text: When we don't know what to eat, we always slide into Waffle house.  The atmosphere, the food, the service is never disappointing.  These folks do food right.  It serves us well because we are grits eaters with bacon or sausage.  Their coffee is always served fresh and hot and we can make special requests like, would you please pour out this cold coffee, keep my same cup, and pour me another cup?  Always a good choice!

data.title: Don't Go Late Night
data.text: You can't say much about the food. It is what it is. Don't go late in the evening unless you want to watch the shows that walk in. 2 hourly hotels are nearby which make for a evening of entertainment from walk in's. Big with the locals and senior citizens of the city.

data.title: Not bad
data.text: Wanted some breakfast and decided on going to the Waffle House.  The server was very nice and polite, but the  gentleman cooking must of been having a bad day.  When the server asked him about if he could make some oatmeal, he gave her a negative look, turned back around and never gave her an answer back for the customer.  Overall the food was great.

data.title: Fast and Delicious
data.text: We came in around 10pm and it was kinda slow. Our server was great and carried on a conversation. Our orders were out in less than ten minutes and everything was perfect.  Great food at a great value. They kept our cups full and checked on us every few minutes. We will be back to this location for sure.

data.title: #1 Date spot
data.text: Let it be known everybody that is ever loved or dated someone are just a night after drinking at a local bar we all know we end up at the Waffle House. sometimes there's drama and entertainment in here and then sometimes is peaceful the best thing about the south is cheese grits and waffle house their sweet tea it's delicious the bacon egg and cheese wrap will definitely fill you up

data.title: Clean and efficient
data.text: Was convenient to hotel while in town. Not much for franchises but this one is generally trustworthy. Didn't disappoint, though nothing noteworthy. Efficient service even at breakfast rush time. Well kept premises but rest room was a little messy. Easy access even with road construction going on at the time. Would try again. Great pecan waffles and coffee.

data.title: Constantly one of highest rated.
data.text: This little oasis to all night workers is staffed by very experienced compitant personnel. Friendly and attentive. Custom orders are handled well. This store consistantly has highest health rating among peers in area.

data.title: The chicken and eggs are always good and hash browns are incredible
data.text: It seems that the Waffle House is a southern institution here in the south.  The food is always good but be ready to wait for a table during peak breakfast times.  I tend to enjoy their breakfasts so I can never seem to try one of their "lunch or dinner" items.  When you find something you like you just have to stick to it.

data.title: Good Food
data.text: The hashbrowns were good and not undercook like other restaurants that I ate at. The tea was very tasty. The service was outstanding.
